pages.text: Blowing (or sucking) air through certain liquids or blocks with an $(item)encased fan/$ will give you access to new types of crafting (in bulk):$(br)$(li)$(bold)Water:/$ Splashing, to wash your items from impurities.$(li)$(bold)Fire:/$ Smoking, to cook your food to perfect temperature.$(li)$(bold)Lava:/$ Blasting, to smelt pretty much anything else.$(br)This replaces your $(item)furnace/$.

pages.title: Encased Fan
pages.text: The fan's speed does not affect how quickly it converts items!
